page.title: 12LIFESTYLES
page.content: LIFESTYLES { Of the people interviewed none had {lived in their respective villages all {their lives.But all had been'born and {bred'in the country and,therefore, {enjoy living in their villages.They {all said that if they moved they would {stay in the country and most of them {would not even move away from that {area.Of the people interviewed the {length of time for which they had {lived there ranged from 3 weeks to 46 {years. { Being a rural area all said that {they are interested in conservation {although the gamekeeper felt that the {farmers should show more interest and {concern.Having said that,all agreed {that the area was too small to be in {need of a conservation group. { The general political leaning of {the area is conservative,their }
